subtitle: My Experience
title: Experience is what matters the most.

experiences.title: Senior Software Engineer
experiences.description: Developed a React-based self-service portal and dynamic ad creatives for an SSP client in the Digital Out-of-Home (DOOH) advertising space, contributing to ~$1.5M in revenue. Focused on building reusable, responsive UI components with React, Reactstrap, and Storybook, while integrating RESTful APIs and collaborating closely with backend teams. Also built a Django-based admin panel for internal operations and ensured code quality through comprehensive testing with Jest and React Testing Library.

experiences.title: Application Development Analyst
experiences.description: Key responsibilites involved creating custom UI components for React based DTH application. Also used Redux for state management and MUI as styling library. Resolved application issues by analysing session logs data using Splunk, EFK and Oracle SQL Developer tools.

experiences.title: Web Development Intern
experiences.description: Designed, developed, and managed full-stack websites for clients from domains such as education, hospitality, health & food. Used PHP, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript and MySQL.
